description: U. L. Karunawathie Vs. N.Wasantha Kumara & others - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J before  Rules of natural justice are to be observed when there is a public duty cast upon the authorities concerned

judgement_by: Rules of natural justice are to be observed when there is a public duty cast upon the authorities concerned
